name: babylonjs-colyseus
description: Boilerplate intended to be used for the BabylonJS 2.5 Challenge

scripts.compile-client: npm install --prefix client && cd client && ./node_modules/.bin/webpack --env.production && cd -
scripts.install: npm run compile-server && npm run compile-client

author: Endel Dreyer <endel.dreyer@gmail.com>
